title: Evil Things Christmas, Holiday Singles, Truth Be Told, Xmas Poetry and more.
itunes:title: Evil Things Christmas, Holiday Singles, Truth Be Told, Xmas Poetry and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today's show is dedicated to specific groups of people. Bitterman has some evil things that you can do during Christmas. Is being single during the holiday season better than not being or nah? Junior has special holiday poetry for you. It is unanimous that people back in the day put more effort than those today in Christmas decorations for the home. In truth be told, Junior tells us that men need good presents too. What would we learn about each crew member if we went through their phone? Fool #2 gets to know what songs are top of the list for Christmas while roaming the streets. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about what putting air in your bubble really means, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
